00055 /*
00056  * Object that represents the interface of the link module.
00057  */
00058 static layer_link_t interface;
00059 
00060 /*============================================================================*/
00061 /* Public functions implementations.                                          */
00062 /*============================================================================*/
00063 
00064 layer_link_t *link_get_interface() {
00065         interface.link_connect_to = llp_connect_to;
00066         interface.link_connect_any = llp_connect_any;
00067         interface.link_register_connect = llp_register_connect;
00068         interface.link_unregister_connect = llp_unregister_connect;
00069         interface.link_register_close = llp_register_close;
00070         interface.link_unregister_close = llp_unregister_close;
00071         interface.link_read = llp_read;
00072         interface.link_write = llp_write;
00073         interface.link_disconnect = llp_disconnect;
00074         interface.link_get_last_error = llp_get_last_error;
00075         return &interface;
00076 }
00077 /******************************************************************************/
00078 int link_initialize(char *config_file) {
00079         
00080         if (llp_configure(config_file) == LLP_ERROR) {
00081                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error initializing llp.");
00082                 return LINK_ERROR;
00083         }
00084 
00085         if (llp_create_socket(llp_get_port()) == LLP_ERROR) {
00086                 return LINK_ERROR;      
00087         }
00088 
00089         if (llp_sessions_initialize() == LLP_ERROR) {
00090                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error initializing sessions.");
00091                 return LINK_ERROR;
00092         }
00093 
00094         if (llp_nodes_initialize() == LLP_ERROR) {
00095                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error initializing nodes.");
00096                 return LINK_ERROR;
00097         }
00098         
00099         if (llp_info_initialize() == LLP_ERROR) {
00100                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error initializing nodes.");
00101                 return LINK_ERROR;
00102         }
00103         
00104         if (llp_queue_initialize() == LLP_ERROR) {
00105                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error initializing queue.");
00106                 return LINK_ERROR;
00107         }
00108         
00109         if (llp_create_threads() == LLP_ERROR) {
00110                 liblog_error(LAYER_LINK, "error creating threads.");
00111                 return LINK_ERROR;
00112         }
00113         
00114         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "llp module initialized.");
00115         
00116         return LINK_OK;
00117 }
00118 /******************************************************************************/
00119 void link_finalize() {
00120         
00121         llp_close_socket();     
00122         
00123         llp_destroy_threads();
00124         llp_queue_finalize();
00125         llp_sessions_finalize();
00126         llp_nodes_finalize();
00127         llp_info_finalize();
00128         llp_unconfigure();
00129         
00130         liblog_debug(LAYER_LINK, "llp module finalized.");
00131 }
00132 /******************************************************************************/
